```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(lubridate)
date <- "02-24-2023"
weekday <- wday(mdy(date), label = TRUE, abbr = FALSE)
month <- month(mdy(date), label = TRUE)
day <- day(mdy(date))
```
